This is an archontological 'list of [[Serbs|Serbian]] monarchs', containing
monarchs of the medieval principalities, to heads of state of modern
'[[Serbia]]'.

The dates back to the Early Middle Ages. The Serbian royal titles used include
Prince, Grand Prince, King, Emperor and Despot.
headings: Fall of the Serbian Empire and Despot Era (1371–1530)
Governors of Serbia during foreign rule
